    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RestrictedPlaylist(java.lang.String name, User authorizedUser)
      Constructor that creates a new restricted playlist with duration 0:0:0, empty genre, an empty array for the songs, a counter for the added songs a counter for the authorized users and a main owner
